description:
Shippo is a demon fox whose father was killed by the the Thunder Brothers: Hiten and Manten. He steals the Shikon Jewel shards from Kagome so that he can avenge his father.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El Pequeño Shippo y los hermanos relámpago
Entra em cena Shippou!; Os irmãos youkai relâmpago Hitten e Manten
Shippou Toujou! Raijuu Kyoudai Hiten Manten!!
七宝登場! 雷獣兄弟 飛天満天!!
